actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: Joint resolution calling for the President to transmit a report to Congress within 60 days which contains recommendations for the solution of the economic problems identified in this resolution.

summary.text: Directs the President to transmit a report to Congress within sixty days which shall contain recommendations for such legislative and administrative actions as he deems appropriate to solve the economic problems described in this resolution, including: (1) housing unit starts; (2) petroleum and forest growth inadequacies, (3) interest rates; (4) unemployment; (5) the energy crisis; and (6) inflation.

titles.title: Joint resolution calling for the President to transmit a report to Congress within 60 days which contains recommendations for the solution of the economic problems identified in this resolution.
